page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT IN CHITTERNE
page.content: There is no place of entertainment in Chitterne except the King's Head Public House which serves drink and food. It has a pool billiards table for the use of customers. The Women's Institute holds monthly meetings and a Christmas party in the Village Hall.A firework display to mark Guy Fawke's night is also held in the village recreation field. TOURISM: Passing tourists are attracted to the area because of the beautiful open countryside, the proximity of Stonehenge, the surrounding ancient earthworks and the attractive and historic towns and villages in the vicinity. The only facilities for tourists are overnight camping on private land and accommodation in private houses.
